Marketing Strategist Job at Owens and Xley Consults




        
    

        
        Owens and Xley Consults is a recruitment firm based in Lagos that offers business advisory and consulting services to help Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Strategist
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	The Marketing Strategist will develop and execute innovative marketing campaigns for our brand.
	In this role, you’ll craft and execute marketing campaigns that engage our audience, elevate brand awareness, and drive sales all while staying true to our brand’s heart and values.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute marketing strategies to boost brand visibility and sales.
	Lead and optimize digital marketing efforts across social media, SEO, email campaigns, and paid ads.
	Analyze market trends, consumer behavior, and competitors to find fresh opportunities.
	Work closely with the creative team to produce content that speaks to our audience.
	Track and report on campaign performance, using data to tweak and improve strategies.
	Build strong relationships with influencers, partners, and media to grow our brand presence.
	Stay ahead of the curve with industry trends and marketing tools to keep our strategies fresh and effective.


Required Skills and Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	3+ years of hands-on experience in marketing strategy, ideally in the gifting or retail space is a plus.
	Strong knowledge of digital marketing tools and strategies.
	Excellent at analyzing data and using it to make smarter marketing decisions.
	Collaborative and communicative, ready to work with cross-functional teams.
	Proficiency in tools like Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and CRM systems
	Previous experience in running successful campaigns that deliver measurable results.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@owensxley.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

I.T. Support Officer Job at Voltaire Lifestyle Services Limiterd




        
    

        
        Voltaire Lifestyle Services Limiterd are the owners of GAIA AFRICA Club and Gaby Lagos, luzury brands, situated in Victoria Island in Lagos State. It is a hospitality Company with a luxury restaurant, a private business club house and event management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: I.T. Support Officer

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	In the fast-paced hospitality sector, the I.T. Support Officer plays a critical role in supporting systems that directly impact guest experience, operational efficiency, and staff productivity.
	The I.T. Support Officer is responsible for the day-to-day operation and support of the company's I.T. infrastructure and end-user systems ensuring the smooth functioning of all hardware and software, maintaining network security, and delivering timely and efficient support services.


Job Responsibilities


	Provide first-line technical support to staff, ensuring prompt resolution of hardware, software, and network-related issues.
	Maintain and support systems (Point-of-Sale software), ensuring optimal uptime.
	Oversee the installation, configuration, and routine maintenance of all I.T. hardware including servers, workstations, printers, routers, access points, and other peripheral devices.
	Manage the local area network (LAN), wireless networks, internet access, and telecommunications systems to ensure consistent availability.
	Ensure timely software updates, data backups, and security patches across all systems.
	Provide technical support for meetings, events, and conferences hosted within the facility.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
	Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in a similar I.T. support role, preferably within the hospitality industry
	Strong abilities in I.T Hardware support.
	Hands-on experience with hospitality technology systems is highly desirable
	Excellent understanding of Microsoft 365, networking (TCP/IP), Windows OS, and server environments.
	Flexibity to provide after-hours or weekend support as required.
	IT certifications would be an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Applications to: careers@gaiaafricaclub.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: We appreciate all applications, however, only qualified candidates who put in their application early will be contacted.
